title: CaC2 rxn - conc of NaOCl if 0.010 mol Cl2 produced

content.prompt: Reaction 2 occurs when an excess of 6 M HCl(aq) solution is added to 100. mL of NaOCl(aq) of unknown concentration. If the reaction goes to completion and 0.010 mol of Cl2(g) is produced, then what was the molarity of the NaOCl(aq) solution?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
